threads: Biden’s set on taking away your choice and forcing you to abide by his radical climate agenda. Un-American!
text: lol guess it's 'un-american' to want a planet we can actually live on. biden's climate agenda > greedy corps trashing earth for $$$.  now b4 it's too late. capitalism ain't it, fam. we need change, not more of the same. 🌎✊
